channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 华尔街的经济学家们希望科维德事件后的生产力繁荣能够持续下去，这将在通胀不回升的情况下维持强劲的经济增长。美联储官员对这一想法很感兴趣，但有点怀疑
item.description: Wall Street economists are looking for the post-Covid boom in productivity to continue, which would sustain strong growth without a pickup in inflation. Federal Reserve officials are intrigued by the idea, but a little bit skeptical trib.al/GzRk6eD

item.title: 市场开始猜测美联储的下一步行动是向上而非向下
item.description: Markets are starting to speculate if the Fed's next move is up, not down trib.al/8V0XJbW

item.title: 对于各类企业而言，私人信贷正成为主流贷款的有力竞争者。然而，当下一次大的经济衰退来临时，这个不透明的金融角落将如何应对还不清楚。
item.description: Private credit is becoming a serious rival to mainstream lending for all kinds of businesses. Yet it’s not clear how this opaque corner of finance will cope when the next big recession hits trib.al/GPFDu1q

item.title: @JLeeEnergy 写道：俄罗斯的原油海运面临风险，印度炼油商仍在回避一个关键的出口等级。除非腾出专门的穿梭油轮来装载新货，否则出口将会减少。
item.description: Russia's seaborne crude flows are at risk, with Indian refiners still shunning a key export grade, writes @JLeeEnergy. Exports will be curtailed unless specialized shuttle tankers are freed up to load fresh cargoes. trib.al/vTp1GrL

item.title: 与海外平台相比，比特币在美国加密货币交易所的交易变得更加容易，这种流动性的变化归因于新的数字资产交易所交易基金的影响。
item.description: Bitcoin has become easier to trade on US crypto exchanges compared with platforms overseas, a shift in liquidity attributed to the impact of new exchange-traded funds for the digital asset trib.al/bZ1S3SZ

item.title: 巴西正在与登革热展开一场艰难的战争。
item.description: Brazil is waging a difficult war against dengue fever. trib.al/4cNcmq3

item.title: 俄罗斯要求推翻尤科斯石油公司（曾是俄罗斯最大的石油和天然气公司）破产案中的 500 亿美元裁决，但遭到拒绝
item.description: Russia loses bid to overturn $50 billion award in bankruptcy case of Yukos Oil, once the country's largest oil and gas company trib.al/j6ekQde

item.title: 世界上最美丽的精神能否在自己的繁荣中幸存下来？
item.description: Can the world's most beautiful spirit survive its own boom? trib.al/rfTrIfN

item.title: 法国能源公司正在采用一种新颖的方法，利用美国《通货膨胀削减法》中的一项规定来推动更多清洁能源的发展
item.description: French energy companies are taking a novel approach to using a rule in the US Inflation Reduction Act to spur more clean power trib.al/tAEja2m

item.title: 停靠在开普敦的一艘载有 19,000 头牛的船只散发出恶臭，引发居民投诉和对动物福利的担忧
item.description: A foul stench emanating from a ship carrying 19,000 cattle docked in Cape Town prompts complaints from residents and concerns over animal welfare trib.al/otnXLWk

item.title: "汽车界的空中客车 "正在酝酿之中，以帮助欧洲汽车制造商与中国竞争，抵御生存威胁
item.description: An "Airbus of autos" is being floated to help Europe’s carmakers compete with China and fend off existential threats trib.al/X29TqrE

item.title: 南非第四季度失业率升至 32.1%，原因是社会服务和农业部门裁员
item.description: South Africa’s unemployment rate rose to 32.1% in the fourth quarter as the social services and agriculture sectors cut jobs trib.al/DVWfSvI

item.title: 新加坡航空公司第三季度利润攀升，原因是旅游需求旺盛促进了机票销售，从而提高了航空公司的盈利水平
item.description: Singapore Airlines’ profit climbed in the third quarter as booming travel demand boosted ticket sales that helped the carrier’s bottom line trib.al/84uF5Mu

item.title: 在做空机构 Gotham City Research 发布一系列新问题后，西班牙血浆公司 Grifols 股价暴跌 7.25
item.description: Shares in Spanish blood plasma company Grifols plunge as much as 7.25% after short seller Gotham City Research publishes a new set of questions trib.al/MumFwcV

item.title: 随着南非预算赤字的扩大，政府正在考虑动用 260 亿美元的储备基金。是否应该动用？
item.description: With South Africa’s budget deficit widening, the government is considering tapping a $26 billion reserve fund. Should it go ahead? trib.al/oLO6uFb

item.title: 追求 "美国活力"，安德森-霍洛维茨在华盛顿大展拳脚
item.description: Pursuing ‘American Dynamism,’ Andreessen Horowitz ups its game in DC trib.al/HQ6TJ1I

item.title: 花旗集团（Citigroup）分析师认为，Centrica 近期的股价暴跌 "似乎很残酷"。
item.description: Centrica’s recent share price slump "seems harsh," according to Citigroup analysts. trib.al/Gksz4uR

item.title: 瑞士 1 月份钟表出口小幅增长，原因是奢侈品市场持续放缓，买家对高昂的价格望而却步
item.description: Swiss watch exports rose modestly in January as the luxury slowdown persists and buyers balk at high prices trib.al/OEj3UGb

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯新成立的千亿美元投资公司将与软银在利雅得建立工业机器人工厂
item.description: Saudi Arabia’s new $100 billion investment firm to set up industrial robototics facility with Softbank in Riyadh trib.al/qMN8NtE

item.title: 巴克莱银行的助推器伦敦热潮
item.description: Barclays’ Booster: The London Rush trib.al/dKIttQY

item.title: 瑞典国防部长帕尔-琼森表示，瑞典将向乌克兰提供价值 6.8 亿美元的额外军事援助
item.description: Sweden will send $680 million worth of additional military aid to Ukraine, Defense Minister Pal Jonson says trib.al/MIodet6

item.title:
RT by @markets："我们非常非常看好英国的经商环境。
巴克莱银行首席执行官 C.S. Venkatakrishnan 说，英国在脱欧后 "显示出了自身的韧性"，并表示，"我们非常看好英国作为经商之地的前景"。
了解《今日市场》的最新信息：
item.description:
"We are very, very bullish on UK as a place to do business"

Barclays CEO C.S. Venkatakrishnan says the UK has "shown itself to be resilient" after Brexit and Covid

Get the latest with Markets Today: trib.al/SfovxKr

item.title: 由于诺和诺德公司和制药业同行扩大了生产规模，丹麦经济在第四季度迅速增长
item.description: Denmark’s economy expanded rapidly in the fourth quarter as Novo Nordisk and pharmaceutical peers ramped up production trib.al/tpFZim1

item.title: 马来西亚林吉特跌至 1998 年以来的最低水平
item.description: The Malaysian ringgit fell to its lowest level since 1998 trib.al/GTSrR3C

item.title:
RT by @markets：罗斯柴尔德家族的争斗、网络犯罪团伙的瓦解以及汽车竞争对手探索联合起来竞争电动汽车市场
收听《欧洲早间新闻》播客。
您的早间简报，您在 15 分钟内需要的商业新闻。
item.description:
The Rothschild clans do battle, a prolific cyber gang is disrupted and automotive rivals explore combining to compete in the EV market

Listen to The Daybreak Europe Podcast.

Your morning briefing, the business news you need in just 15 minutes.

omny.fm/shows/bloomberg-dayb…

item.title: 巴克莱银行表示，作为首席执行官文卡塔克里希南在未来几年将回报率提高到 12% 以上的努力的一部分，该公司将大力削减成本。
item.description: Barclays says it will go on a major cost-cutting drive as part of CEO Venkatakrishnan’s efforts to boost returns above 12% in the coming years trib.al/9Rg3yXj

item.title: 欧洲乘用车交付量上升，原因是大众和斯泰伦特等汽车制造商利用了积压订单，而且电动汽车的需求也有所恢复
item.description: Passenger-car deliveries in Europe rise as automakers like Volkswagen and Stellantis fed off order backlogs and demand for electric cars recovered trib.al/ty9ymKT

item.title: 伦敦证券交易所正在全球范围内为新生儿父母推出 26 周的带薪育儿假，超过了世界上一些最大的金融公司所提供的福利。
item.description: The London Stock Exchange is rolling out 26 weeks of paid parental leave for new parents globally, surpassing the benefit offered by some of the world’s biggest finance firms. trib.al/4I2u48x

item.title: 印度农民团体拒绝接受政府提出的保证某些农作物最低价格的提议，目前这些农作物的交易没有此类保障措施，预计他们将于周三恢复正在进行的抗议活动
item.description: Indian farmer groups reject a government offer to guarantee minimum prices for some crops currently traded with no such safeguard, and are expected to resume the ongoing protest on Wednesday trib.al/EKkFNnC

item.title: Colchester Global 正在加强对拉美债券的投资，同时继续回避中国债务--这一策略帮助其去年击败了 99% 的同行。
item.description: Colchester Global is beefing up its investment in Latin American bonds while continuing to sidestep Chinese debt — a formula that helped it beat 99% of its peers last year trib.al/4byeAW5
